title: Pen
assignees: Dong Guan Szu Mao Stationery Gift Co., Ltd.

claims.preamble: The ornamental design for a pen, as shown and described.

description: FIG. 1 is a three-dimensional view of a pen showing my new design;

FIG. 3 is the rear elevational view thereof;
